name: Memory Bank v04 Enhanced
description: Enhanced Memory Bank MCP with smart SQL truncation, multi-table extraction, and search prioritization
long_description: Memory Bank v04 Enhanced provides persistent AI collaboration memory with revolutionary content access improvements. Version 1.4.0 introduces smart context-aware SQL truncation that adapts to query patterns, enhanced multi-table content extraction with priority search order (documents_v2 â†’ discussions â†’ artifacts), and intelligent search prioritization ensuring context.db content is found first. Features automatic Memory Bank command awareness, seamless user experience with automatic suggestions, and complete resolution of content accessibility limitations. Includes comprehensive schema verification, backup system, template specifications, and full-text search across all content types. Production-ready with backward compatibility and enhanced user guidance.
